questions.question: 1.  Which of the following is a byproduct of RBC breakdown?
2.  Hemoglobin is a ________ containing bio molecule.
3. A person with Rh+blood cannot receive blood from a person with Rh- blood without any problems.
4.  Which of the following statements is true about ABO blood system?

answers.b: It was discovered by Karl Landsteiner.
answers.c: Few people are actually typed for this system because of the difficulty of the procedure and high cost
answers.d: It was discovered in the 1950s by Karl Landsteiner.
